name: eraticate
description:
Some sales girls are tasked with cleaning the shop from intruding mice. Made for the Minijam 22, theme: Anime

W/S to scroll up and down, and enter to select are the controls. keyboard only meant for browser only.

Programming by Dev, follow him here: Twitter , More from Dev
Music by Emily, follow her here: Twitter , Instagram, More from Emily

(unfortunately life got in the way of the jam so I had made the win and loss condition early in case this would happen so the game is a little buggy)
